author: cmlenz
msg: Add an experimental 'content' tag that will reset the response buffers and
try to stream the content of a selected node revision to the client. This
allows the viewing of slide resources in the context of a JSP application
without having to write a servlet, or redirect to the WebdavServlet
This tag should also implement the usage of Content-Range for better
performance, but for that the corresponding code in
o.a.s.webdav.method.GetMethod should be factored out into a utility class.

author: cmlenz
msg: - Need to store a reference to the NodeRevisionDescriptors in RevisionBean
- Add method to return an InputStream of the revision's content

author: msmith
msg: Fix two typos in the tables listing in howto-jdbcstore,
and change column name in link table to match the actual

author: juergen
msg: Can be built with supplied Build.xml
